review: *** ****** ** ***** ************* *** ********* He explains everything beforehand and clears all your doubts. There is a follow up call after every procedure to check on you. Sufficient support and guidance is provided by the doctor as well as the staff. A good care is taken of hygiene and sanitation. Highly recommended.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We had an enjoyable experience with Dr. Dilip Raj Purohit and his staff. My daughter was very anxious about the appointment and any procedure, but Dr. Dilip Raj Purohit was very patient with her and spent a lot of time trying to calm her down, the staff was accommodating and kind and always available to help. Dr. Dilip Raj Purohit is very professional, he takes the time to explain what needs to be done and provides valuable advice, It's not easy to find a good dentist for your kids, so I highly recommend Dr. Dilip Raj Purohit and her staff for kids and adults.
